allTitles: {"ahk":"Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း","en":"Avoid covid-19","my":"Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း","nst":"Kovit-19 mäx tawzlawz lam"}

0.ahk: Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း
0.mya: Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း

4.ahk: Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း
4.mya: Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း

5.eng:
Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen 

Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public

Version 27.3.2020

7.eng: Translator Kham, Illustrator Ai Yawn Kap

11.eng: Yaq kàrä sazbon mäq khaqkhaq hez ruq hez raongx läq. Kàmäq, louxngix (spirit) tsiqkham tai mäq àkàlawz thüx yaq hex cyängz jel mäq mänz samhia hexhiiq àmaix.

12.eng: Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.
12.nst: Mäk, khüz naix nü kàrä naq thänxshäm kiq.

13.eng: Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose  the used tissue immediately.
13.nst: Hatchü, saw khaok raüyäq khüz naix nü kàrä yaqlaok tànaongx mäq law tätcyezyaq (tissue) mäq law tànap pängxvängx raongx läq. Kàrä langx ye tätcyezyaq kàrä sinzcyiiz thiix cyängz nä baicsaic läq.

14.eng: Maintain 2 meters distance between yourself and others.
14.nst: Maic vez shiz naix vez shiz kä àkawmx punzthum mitar 2 (fut 6) tàhiiz raongx läq.

15.eng:
Stay home if you feel unwell.
If you have fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.
15.nst: Hanzhia mäk nguz raükä yäm nä haixngax raongx läq. Saw khaok, dfidfüx tàtaüz naix dfisix àsi nguz raükä àye punzthum tsiqrung nä kizvaz tàchixhax raongx läq.

16.eng: Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19. Follow advice given by your healthcare provider.
16.nst: Kovit-19 raix sengx raütä thawx àpha ànyenye tiim lap thüx raongx läq. Hanzsängx lam airut mäq tàdaongx tàtaicyaong kuq tàläq phanxcyanx cyängz lamz àli thunx kàrä samhia phancyan raongx läq.

bookText.ahk:
Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း



 Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း
bookText.eng:
Avoid covid-19



Avoid covid-19
Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen 

Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public

Version 27.3.2020
Literacy for Women in Africa
Translator Kham, Illustrator Ai Yawn Kap



Yaq kàrä sazbon mäq khaqkhaq hez ruq hez raongx läq. Kàmäq, louxngix (spirit) tsiqkham tai mäq àkàlawz thüx yaq hex cyängz jel mäq mänz samhia hexhiiq àmaix.
Avoid touching eyes, nose and mouth.

Cover your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze. Dispose  the used tissue immediately.



Maintain 2 meters distance between yourself and others.


Stay home if you feel unwell.
If you have fever, cough and difficulty breathing, seek medical attention early.


Stay informed on the latest developments about COVID-19. Follow advice given by your healthcare provider.
bookText.mya:
Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း




Covid-19ကို ရှောင်ရှားခြင်း
bookText.nst:
Kovit-19 mäx tawzlawz lam



Kovit-19 mäx tawzlawz lam







Mäk, khüz naix nü kàrä naq thänxshäm kiq.
Hatchü, saw khaok raüyäq khüz naix nü kàrä yaqlaok tànaongx mäq law tätcyezyaq (tissue) mäq law tànap pängxvängx raongx läq. Kàrä langx ye tätcyezyaq kàrä sinzcyiiz thiix cyängz nä baicsaic läq.
Maic vez shiz naix vez shiz kä àkawmx punzthum mitar 2 (fut 6) tàhiiz raongx läq.
Hanzhia mäk nguz raükä yäm nä haixngax raongx läq. Saw khaok, dfidfüx tàtaüz naix dfisix àsi nguz raükä àye punzthum tsiqrung nä kizvaz tàchixhax raongx läq.
Kovit-19 raix sengx raütä thawx àpha ànyenye tiim lap thüx raongx läq. Hanzsängx lam airut mäq tàdaongx tàtaicyaong kuq tàläq phanxcyanx cyängz lamz àli thunx kàrä samhia phancyan raongx läq.

title: Kovit-19 mäx tawzlawz lam
